name: Create Authvia merchants from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new merchant in Authvia. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VYR9AUf9Xx5ae2sGTk3IjFTA1NTalhYxXIuoF3kxY2Y/edit?usp=sharing).
